name: 雷纳·韦斯
bio_short: 德裔美国物理学家，LIGO（激光干涉引力波天文台）的联合创始人和构思者之一。他因对LIGO探测器和引力波观测的决定性贡献，获得了2017年诺贝尔物理学奖。
bio_short_en: A German-born American physicist, co-founder and conceptual inventor of LIGO. He was awarded the 2017 Nobel Prize in Physics for his decisive contributions to the LIGO detector and the observation of gravitational waves.
